Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Westbound Reroute near 39th/Michigan
ShortDescription: Westbound #39 Pershing buses are rerouted via 39th, Indiana, 35th, State, then resume their normal route on 39th due to street blockage near 39th/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, Indiana, 35th, State, then resume their normal route on 39th.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near 39th/Michigan.
